name: codespell
description: Fix common misspellings in your source code
helpMarkDown: For help, please raise an issue at https://github.com/rhyskoedijk/codespell-azure-devops/issues
author: Rhys Koedijk

inputs.name: commitSuggestions
inputs.label: Commit suggestions
inputs.helpMarkDown: If `true`, when misspellings are found, suggested fixes will be committed directly to the source branch of the pull request associated with the run. If `false`, no commits will be made. If this pipeline is not run in the context of a pull request, this setting will be ignored.

inputs.name: commentSuggestions
inputs.label: Comment suggestions
inputs.helpMarkDown: If `true`, when misspellings are found, suggested fixes will be added as comments to the pull request associated with the run. If `false`, no comments will be added. If this pipeline is not run in the context of a pull request, this setting will be ignored.

inputs.name: postFixCommand
inputs.label: Post-fix command(s)
inputs.helpMarkDown: Commands to run after fixing misspellings. This can be used to run code linting tools. if required. Multiple commands can be separated by a new line.

inputs.name: serviceConnection
inputs.label: Azure DevOps Service Connection
inputs.helpMarkDown: The Azure DevOps service connection to use, if you want to use a different service principal than the default when committing and commenting suggested fixes for misspellings.

inputs.name: accessToken
inputs.label: Azure DevOps Personal Access Token
inputs.helpMarkDown: The Azure DevOps Personal Access Token (PAT) for accessing Azure DevOps repositories, if you want to use a different service principal than the default when committing and commenting suggested fixes for misspellings.

inputs.name: skipIfCodeSpellConfigMissing
inputs.label: Skip if codespell is not configured for the repository (i.e. `.codespellrc` does not exist)
inputs.helpMarkDown: Skip the task if codespell is not configured for the repository (i.e. `.codespellrc` does not exist)

inputs.name: failOnMisspelling
inputs.label: Fail if codespell misspellings are found
inputs.helpMarkDown: Fail the task if codespell misspellings are found
